attributes.action: arrange/ sponser a multifaith concert (Spirit of Britain Concert) to bring together people of all faiths/backgrounds in the UK and strengthen the British spirit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We must widen our understanding and show our tolerance towards every person in Britain. Lets stand strong together and spread the message of love worldwide.

This concert will include readings from all Holy books and songs/acts from all backgrounds.

We want this concert to be a reminder to the rest of the world of the spirit of Britain & its tolerance of other faiths.

After i've got enough names signed up i will be looking for sponsors to sponsor the event.
